translationEngine.description: Label for the translation engine dropdown.

aiEngineProfiles.description: Title for the AI Engine Profiles section.

aiEngineName.description: Label for the AI engine name input.

noRulesFound.description: Message when no AI engines are configured.

aiApiKey.description: Label for the AI API key input.

aiApiUrl.description: Label for the AI API endpoint URL input.

aiModelName.description: Label for the AI model name input.

testConnection.description: Button text for testing API connection.

deeplxApiUrl.description: Label for the DeepLx API URL input.

googleApiKey.description: Label for the Google API key input.

targetLanguage.description: Label for the target language input.

translationSelector.description: Label for the translation selector input.

selectorDescription.message: Comma-separated CSS selectors for elements to be translated.
selectorDescription.description: Description for the translation selector input.

displayFormat.description: Section heading for display format settings.

displayMode.description: Label for the display mode options.

replaceOriginal.description: Option to replace original text with translation.

appendTranslated.description: Option to append translation to original text.

hoverToDisplay.description: Option to show translation on hover.

rule.description: Label for the rule selection dropdown.

addDomainRule.description: Button to open the domain rule modal for adding.

addAiEngine.description: Button text to add a new AI Engine profile.

editDomainRule.description: Title for the domain rule modal when editing.

domainRuleModalTitle.description: Generic title for the domain rule modal.

saveRule.description: Button to save a domain rule.

applyToSubdomains.description: Label for the subdomain switch in the domain rule modal.

useDefaultSetting.description: Option in dropdowns to inherit from global settings.

selectorPlaceholderDomain.description: Placeholder for the domain-specific CSS selector textarea.

overrideDefaultSelectors.description: Label for the CSS override switch.

domainCannotBeEmpty.description: Error message for empty domain input.

saveRuleSuccess.description: Status message after saving a domain rule.

confirmDeleteRule.message: Are you sure you want to delete this rule?
confirmDeleteRule.description: Confirmation message before deleting a domain rule.

currentRules.description: Heading for the list of current domain rules.

domainSelectorDescription.message: Use , to separate multiple selectors. Leave empty to use default selectors.
domainSelectorDescription.description: Helper text for the domain-specific CSS selector.

rulesDescription.message: Rules apply to the exact hostname. Default is "Manual Translate".

importSuccess.message: Settings imported successfully! UI has been updated.

importError.message: Failed to import settings. The file might be corrupted or invalid.

invalidRegexWarning.message: Some pre-check rules contain invalid regular expressions. Please fix them before saving.
invalidRegexWarning.description: Warning message when pre-check rules have invalid regexes.

resetSettings.description: Button text to reset all settings to default.

resetSettingsConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to their default values? This action cannot be undone.

resetSettingsSuccess.message: Settings have been reset to default.
resetSettingsSuccess.description: Status message after successfully resetting settings.

aiCustomPrompt.description: Label for the custom prompt textarea for AI translator.

aiCustomPromptPlaceholder.message: You are a translation assistant. Translate the user's text from {sourceLang} to {targetLang}. Output only the translated text. Variables {sourceLang} and {targetLang} will be replaced with language codes (e.g., EN, ZH).
aiCustomPromptPlaceholder.description: Placeholder for the custom prompt textarea.

aiApiUrlMissingError.message: AI API Endpoint URL is not configured in settings. Please set it up.
aiApiUrlMissingError.description: Error message when the AI API URL is missing.

aiModelNameMissingError.message: AI Model Name is not configured in settings. Please set it up.
aiModelNameMissingError.description: Error message when the AI Model Name is missing.

googleApiKeyPlaceholder.message: Enter your Google Cloud Translation API Key

contextMenuTitle.description: Context menu item for translating selected text. %s is the placeholder for the selected text.

popupRuleDefault.description: Text in popup indicating that default rules are active.

popupDisplayMode.description: Label for the display mode dropdown in the popup.

popupDisplayModeReplace.description: Replace mode option in the popup.

popupDisplayModeAppend.description: Append mode option in the popup.

popupDisplayModeHover.description: Hover mode option in the popup.

precheckRulesTitle.description: Title for the Pre-check Rules section.

precheckRulesDescription.message: Configure rules to include (whitelist) or exclude (blacklist) text from translation. Blacklist rules are checked first. Text must match an enabled language whitelist rule to be translated.
precheckRulesDescription.description: Description for the Pre-check Rules section.

precheckTab_general.description: Tab title for general pre-check rules.

precheckRuleWhitespace.description: Name of the default rule that matches whitespace.

precheckRulePunctuation.description: Name of the default rule that matches numbers, punctuation, and symbols.

precheckRuleEmoji.description: Name of the default rule that matches a single emoji.

precheckRuleSingleWord.description: Name of the default rule that matches a single English letter.

precheckRuleEmail.description: Default rule to match email addresses.

precheckRuleAcronymsGeneral.description: Name of the default rule that matches common general-purpose acronyms.

precheckRuleAcronymsTech.description: Name of the default rule that matches common technology and computing acronyms.

precheckRuleAcronymsBusiness.description: Name of the default rule that matches common business-related acronyms.

precheckRuleAcronymsGov.description: Name of the default rule that matches acronyms for governments and organizations.

precheckRuleContains.description: Prefix for language-specific rules, e.g., 'Contains English'.

ruleNamePlaceholder.description: Placeholder for the rule name input.

flagsPlaceholder.description: Placeholder for the regex flags input.

blacklist.description: Option for blacklist mode in a rule.

whitelist.description: Option for whitelist mode in a rule.

enabled.description: Checkbox label to enable a rule.

collapseTest.description: Button text to collapse the test area.

testSourcePlaceholder.description: Placeholder for the test translation source text area.

testSourceEmpty.description: Error message when the test source text is empty.

testNotTranslated.message: Original text (not translated due to pre-check rule):
testNotTranslated.description: Message for test translation when text is not translated due to pre-check rules or same language.

translateButtonText.description: Text for the manual translate button in the content script.

logEntryPrecheckRuleError.description: Log entry for error during pre-check rule application. Placeholders: [ruleName, errorMessage]

logEntryPrecheckNoWhitelistRule.message: [Pre-check] No enabled whitelist rule found for target language $1. Translation will proceed.
logEntryPrecheckNoWhitelistRule.description: Log entry when no whitelist rule is found for the target language.

logEntryCacheMiss.message: [Cache] Translation not found in cache. Proceeding with API call.

logEntryNoTranslator.message: [Error] No valid translator selected or initialized.
logEntryNoTranslator.description: Log entry when no translator is available.

precheckRuleSameLanguage.description: Name for the pre-check rule: source and target language are the same.

precheckRulePunctuation.description: Name of the default rule that matches numbers, punctuation, and symbols.

hideLogButton.description: Button text to hide the translation log.

testLogButton.description: Button text to show the translation log.

testLogTitle.description: Title for the translation log area.

logEntryStart.description: Log entry for start of translation. Placeholders: [text, sourceLang, targetLang]

logEntryPrecheckStart.description: Log entry for the start of pre-check rules.

logEntryPrecheckMatch.message: [Pre-check] Rule "$1" ($2) matched. Text will not be translated.
logEntryPrecheckMatch.description: Log entry when a pre-check rule matches and prevents translation. Placeholders: [ruleName, ruleMode]

logEntryPrecheckNoMatch.description: Log entry when a pre-check rule does not match. Placeholders: [ruleName, ruleMode]

logEntryPrecheckEraserUsed.message: [Pre-check] Rule "$1" ($2) was used as an eraser, removing matched parts.
logEntryPrecheckEraserUsed.description: Log entry when a pre-check rule is used as an eraser. Placeholders: [ruleName, ruleMode]

logEntryPrecheckNeutralRemoved.message: [Pre-check] Neutral characters (digits, spaces, punctuation, symbols) were removed.
logEntryPrecheckNeutralRemoved.description: Log entry when neutral characters are removed during pre-check.

logEntryPrecheckFinalCheck.description: Log entry showing the final text after erasures. Placeholder: [remainingText]

logEntryPrecheckNoTranslation.message: [Pre-check] Text determined not to require translation. Returning original text.
logEntryPrecheckNoTranslation.description: Log entry when pre-check determines no translation is needed.

logEntryPrecheckError.description: Log entry for a pre-check configuration error. Placeholder: [errorMessage]

logEntryEngineUsed.description: Log entry for the chosen translation engine. Placeholder: [engineName]

logEntryApiRequest.description: Log entry for API call initiation. Placeholder: [translatorName]

logEntryApiResponseSuccess.description: Log entry for successful API response. Placeholder: [partialData]

logEntryApiResponseError.description: Log entry for API response error. Placeholders: [statusCode, statusText]

logEntryTranslationError.description: Log entry for translation failure. Placeholder: [errorMessage]

aiCustomPromptMissingError.message: AI Custom Prompt is not configured in settings. Please set it up.
aiCustomPromptMissingError.description: Error message when the AI custom prompt is missing.

enterTestText.description: Message when test text input is empty.

isRequired.description: Suffix for required field error messages.

fillAllRequiredFields.message: Please fill in all required fields.
fillAllRequiredFields.description: General message for missing required fields.

errorMissingTargetLanguage.message: Target language is not configured. Please update settings.
errorMissingTargetLanguage.description: Error when target language is missing for a translation task.

errorMissingEngine.message: Translation engine is not configured. Please update settings.
errorMissingEngine.description: Error when translation engine is missing for a translation task.

errorMissingSelector.message: CSS selector for translation is not configured. Please update settings.
errorMissingSelector.description: Error when the CSS selector for page translation is missing.

popupTranslationNotAvailable.message: Translation is not available on this page.
popupTranslationNotAvailable.description: Message shown in the popup when on a page that cannot be translated (e.g., about: pages).

commandToggleTranslation.description: Description for the command that toggles page translation.

commandTranslateSelection.description: Description for the command that translates the selected text.

commandToggleDisplayMode.description: Command to toggle the display mode for page translation.

enterRegex.description: Prompt for entering a regular expression.

invalidRegex.description: Message indicating an invalid regular expression.

regexTestNoMatch.description: Message displayed when a regex test results in no matches.

invalidRegexFlags.description: Message indicating invalid regular expression flags.

testRegexInputLabel.description: Label for the test text input field in the pre-check rules section.

testRegexInputDescription.message: Enter text here to test your regular expression rules.
testRegexInputDescription.description: Helper text for the test text input field.

testRegexInputPlaceholder.message: Enter text to test against the regex...
testRegexInputPlaceholder.description: Placeholder for the test text input field.

runTestButton.description: The button text for running the global pre-check test.

addPrecheckRule.description: Button text to add a new pre-check rule.
